attributes.action: Free dentist checks for patients who have had radiotherapy in the jaw area
attributes.additional_details:
Following cancer treatment for cancers surrounding the jaw area patients can get free prescriptions but they can't currently get free dentist check ups.
Radiation therapy can cause a lot of problems for the teeth when administered in the jaw area.

This petition is to get free dentist check ups for all patients who have had radiotherapy in the jaw area
